  • Field Details

    • penaltyPirate

      public int[] penaltyPirate

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemiesCard

      public EnemiesCard(AdventureType adventureType, AdventureLevel level, String ID, int days, int power, int penalty, CubeToken[] rewardSmuggler)
      constructor for the Smuggler cards
      Parameters:
      level - in which level deck this card is used
      ID - it's identification code
      days - amounts of days to move forwards/backwards when the reward is collected
      power - the amount of power the enemies have
      penalty - how many boxes will be lost if defeated
      rewardSmuggler - which kind of boxes can be gained if successful

    • EnemiesCard

      public EnemiesCard(AdventureType adventureType, AdventureLevel level, String ID, int days, int power, int penalty, int reward)
      constructor for the Slaver cards
      Parameters:
      level - in which level deck this card is used
      ID - it's identification code
      days - amounts of days to move forwards/backwards when the reward is collected
      power - the amount of power the enemies have
      penalty - how many crewmates will be lost if defeated
      reward - how many credits can be gained if successful

    • EnemiesCard

      public EnemiesCard(AdventureType adventureType, AdventureLevel level, String ID, int days, int power, int[] penaltyPirate, int reward)
      constructor for the Pirate cards
      Parameters:
      level - in which level deck this card is used
      ID - it's identification code
      days - amounts of days to move forwards/backwards when the reward is collected
      power - the amount of power the enemies have
      penaltyPirate - which kind of shots will be sent towards the defeated player
      reward - how many credits can be gained if successful
